subject: Football
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Marlin Briscoe was a wide receiver on the Miami Dolphins team that in 1972 went undefeated, the last N.F.L. team to do so.
snippet: Marlin Briscoe was a wide receiver on the Miami Dolphins team that in 1972 went undefeated, the last N.F.L. team to do so.
